Uses of Package
io.permazen.vaadin

  • Packages that use io.permazen.vaadin 
    Package Description
    io.permazen.vaadin
    Classes to facilitate Vaadin applications that interact with a Permazen database.
    io.permazen.vaadin.app
    Support for Permazen GUI applications based on Vaadin.
  • Classes in io.permazen.vaadin used by io.permazen.vaadin 
    Class Description
    AbstractTable
    Support superclass for Tables that are based on Connectable Containers.
    ExprQueryJObjectContainer
    QueryJObjectContainer whose query is defined by a Java expression.
    JObjectContainer
    Vaadin Container backed by Permazen Java model objects.
    JObjectContainer.ObjPropertyDef
    Support superclass for PropertyDef implementations that derive the property value from a JObject.
    QueryJObjectContainer
    Vaadin Container backed by Permazen Java model objects acquired by performing a transactional query and copying out the results into a SnapshotJTransaction.
    ReloadableJObjectContainer
    A JObjectContainer that supports a ReloadableJObjectContainer.reload() operation.
    SizedLabel
    A Label initialized to have undefined size, so its size shrinks to the content.
    TypeContainer
    Hierarical container that contains the tree of all Java model classes in the database schema.
    TypeContainer.Node  
    TypeTable
    Table showing object types.
  • Classes in io.permazen.vaadin used by io.permazen.vaadin.app 
    Class Description
    ConfirmWindow
    A confirmation window.
    JObjectChooser
    Contains widgets that allow choosing an object reference.
    ReloadableJObjectContainer
    A JObjectContainer that supports a ReloadableJObjectContainer.reload() operation.
